original: Campbell, Carl Egron, konstnär, Borgholm, f. 31/7/83 i Linköp. av post-mäst. E. Th. Lundgren o. AmeHe Kullman. G. 36 m. Vera Ericson. — Fem kl. i allm. lärov., stud. f. Carl Wilhelmson v. Valands målarsk. i Gbg 01-05. Stud:res._t. Tyskl. o. Ital. 22-23, Paris 25-32. Egen målarsk. i Lund 19-20 o. i Malmö 23-24. Sep :utställn. i Lund 19, Borås 23 o. i Malmö 24, deltag. i Sv:es allm. konstfören. utställn. 18 o. 41. Medl. av KRO sed. 44.
translated: Campbell, Carl Egron, artist, Borgholm, b. 31/7/83 in Linköping, son of postmaster E. Th. Lundgren and AmeHe Kullman. Married Vera Ericson in 1936. He attended primary school and studied under Carl Wilhelmson at Valand's painting school in Gothenburg from 1901 to 1905. He traveled to Germany and Italy in 1922-23, and to Paris from 1925-1932 for further studies. He established his own painting school in Lund from 1919-1920 and in Malmö from 1923-1924. He held separate exhibitions in Lund in 1919, Borås in 1923, and in Malmö in 1924 and participated in the general exhibition of the Swedish Art Association in 1918 and 1941. He became a member of the Royal Swedish Academy of Fine Arts in 1944.

itemListElement.name: General exhibition of the Swedish Art Association

memberOf.name: Royal Swedish Academy of Fine Arts
